Articles.Content:
spent some time messing in the SPH, came up with this.

heavily influenced by the dropship from "Aliens"

http://oct.imghost.us/aiNc.jpg

http://oct.imghost.us/aiNx.jpg

http://oct.imghost.us/aiOG.jpg

uses B9, FAR, LAZORS (just the standard lazor system, but I have lazor guided and sunbeam installed too) , mechjeb2 (unecessary tbh). I also have kerbal engineer and kethane installed, but dont think I used any of those parts...

also kinda new here, so i have no idea how to post craft file, if anyone wants it just gimme a yell!
